verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're gonna shout loud,
Loud until the walls come down.
Shout loud, loud until the walls come down.
Loud until the walls come down. (2X)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
'Cause we've already won,
And you don't have a chance. (2X)
Yeah, it's already done,
And you don't have a chance,
'Cause we've already won. We have already won.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We're gonna shout loud,
Loud until the final sound.
Shout loud, loud until the final sound.
Loud until the final sound.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
We're gonna shout loud, loud until the walls come down. (8X)
(This is for glory!)

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Yeah, we have already won.
We have already won.
